summary: Code creates two executor classes (FooExecutor and BarExecutor) that extend the Executor class from Jina, implementing functions `foo` and `bar`. The functions receive a DocumentArray and append "foo was here" or "bar was here" to the content. The `@requests` decorator is used for routing purposes.

details.comment: Code creates two executor classes (FooExecutor and BarExecutor) that extend the Executor class from Jina, implementing functions `foo` and `bar`. The functions receive a DocumentArray and append "foo was here" or "bar was here" to the content. The `@requests` decorator is used for routing purposes.
